item.title: Most fashionable arrivals of NFL Week 18, featuring Bryce Young
item.description: Before the Week 18 NFL slate kicked off, players made sure to put their most fashionable foot forward.

item.title: 49ers' 'For the Faithful' look tops NFL Week 18 uniforms
item.description: The final week of the regular season doesn't mean NFL teams are keeping it simple for their wardrobes.

item.title: SEC: 11 tournament hopefuls, with one unexpected Final Four candidate
item.description: The SEC may not be able to replicate last season's success, but the March Madness potentials field remains strong.

item.title: Big 12: 11 potential (and probable) tournament teams
item.description: Four Final Four contenders. Two more tournament-bound teams. And five trending toward the bubble.

item.title: Race for the NFC's No. 1 seed: Biggest questions for Seahawks-49ers
item.description: Both teams are treating Saturday as a playoff game with the No. 1 seed's playoff bye week on the line.
